text: læa cng raluk khna thi mu sa klaw kæ klum chn khxng khea wa “cng raluk thung khwam pordpran khx ngxallxh thi mi tx phwk than meux phraxngkh thrng hı phwk than rxdphn cak wngs wa nkh xng fir xea n doy hı phwk than di lim rs kar thrman xan chawcha læa kha lukchay khxng phwk than læa wi chiwit phuhying khxng phwk than læa nı kar nan yxm penkar thdsxb xyang hıy hlwng cak phracea khxng phwk than”
